mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (receiver_address, receiver_name, receiver_phone, member_id) VALUES (#{receiverAddress}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id AS orderId, m.member_id AS memberId, m.name AS memberName, o.receiver_name AS receiverName, o.receiver_address AS receiverAddress, o.receiver_phone AS receiverPhone, h.ordered_at AS orderedAt FROM `order` AS o, member AS m, history AS h WHERE o.order_id = h.order_id AND m.member_id = o.member_id AND ROWNUM() <= #{page} * #{count} AND ROWNUM() > (#{page}-1)*#{count} ORDER BY orderedAt DESC

SELECT op.ordered_product_id AS orderedProductId, b.brand_id AS brandId, b.brand_name AS brandName, p.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, opt.product_option_name AS productOptionName, h.ordered_at AS orderedAt, op.order_id AS orderId, (op.piece_price * op.quantity) AS price, op.quantity AS quantity FROM member AS m, `order` as o, product_option AS opt, ordered_product AS op, history AS h, brand AS b, product AS p WHERE o.member_id = #{memberId} AND o.member_id = m.member_id AND h.order_id = op.order_id AND p.product_id = opt.product_id AND b.brand_id = p.brand_id AND opt.product_option_id = op.product_option_id GROUP BY op.ordered_product_id ORDER BY op.ordered_product_id DESC
SELECT order_id AS orderId, receiver_address AS receiverAddress, receiver_name AS receiverName, receiver_phone AS receiverPhone, member_id AS memberId FROM `order` WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
